title: Roscoff Deli and Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Free Wi-Fi.  This traditional cafe, bursting with personality and flavour, offers a little bit of Italian style in the centre of Bath. Not much in the way of vegan options and just a few vegetarian. Fair trade coffee, looseleaf tea, homemade cakes, gluten-free and diabetic items. Uses local ingredients whenever possible. The decor is warm, stylish and quirky.
